spec_data.Name: perl-Convert-Age
spec_data.Description:
This is a rather simple perl module for dealing with time intervals.
Convert 189988007 seconds to compact form: 6y7d10h26m47s
Convert compact 5h37m5s to seconds: 20225
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:25:54 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module that converts integer seconds into a "compact" form and back
